live_updates: Technicians are on site working to resolve this issue. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
49377.summary: Some customers in the Metrotown area of Burnaby are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
49377.title: May 10 - Burnaby (Metrotown) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
